[h1]FPSジャンルのメタスコア最高位は伊達じゃない[/h1]
なんでかなと考えたのですがシューティング以外の部分の完成度が評価されてるんじゃないでしょうか。
演出、マップの作りこみ、ゲームバランス、グラフィック、没入感、テンポ、ボリューム
すべてがハイレベルです。
自分のようにAlyxで興味を持った人はプレイして損はないと思います
初代はさすがに現代にプレイすると（十分面白いけど）いろいろ厳しい部分がありましたが
こちらは今でもまったく問題なく遊べます。初代で不満の出る部分がすべて解消されいてプレイしていて気持ちがいいいです。Alyxもそうでしたがかなり細かく調整されてる感じがします。
時系列的にはAlyxの後なのですがこちらを先にプレイしておきたかった・・・

Je l'avais fait il y a des années et ça été un plaisir de me refaire cet Half-Life². Quelques phrases que j'ai trouvé un peu longues et ennuyeuses, comme celle où on pilote l'hydroglisseur et le buggy. La phase qui m'a plus marqué dans le jeu reste Ravenholm. Ça change complètement d'ambiance, on entre dans une phrase d'horreur assez sympathique.
nice old game

2004 год подарил множество отличных игр. Халф лайф 2 не стала исключением. Напротив, эта игра получила культовый статус и признание геймеров по всему миру. Фанаты ждут третью часть и по сей день. 
Теперь об игре. 
Графика не постарела ни на день. Физика предметов и сейчас даёт фору некоторым современным ААА проектам, а в то время данная технология была по-настоящему инновационной. 
Сюжет интригующий и загадочный. Некая сущность G-man, размораживает после 20-летнего сна протагониста Гордона Фримена, для воплощения своих планов. В городе, где мы становимся вернувшимся героем войны. Враги на этот раз люди, объединённые в альянс, устроившие тоталитарный строй в обществе. Из первой части останутся хэд крабы и их модернизированные версии. 
Персонажи имеют прописанный характер, цели, мотивацию. Они сопровождают нас по всему сюжету и служат в основном приманкой для нпс и ключами для дверей. 
К минусам отнесу лишь, низкий интеллект болванчиков нпс, которые следуют на гг в некоторых миссиях. Перекрывая дверные проёмы, не давая вовремя спрятаться, я не редко погибал, лишь потому что команда стоять, в определённом указанном месте, работает через раз.
Игре поставлю 10 из 10. Прекрасная идея и реализация. Замечательная игра. Советую всем пройти и познать классику игр нулевых.

Blood and Sweat, Like a burning Cigarette, Chest hairs starting to Appear, Tears for Fears, Muscles almost Failing, Puzzles and Action, very entertaining. You get to the middle of the game and you feel regretful, it's painfully hurtful. Bones Aching, Meat and Flesh torn off your skin, limbs becoming scrawny and start shaking; start reshaping; you start hallucinating from all the concentration of just one single game, a game that makes you feel like a landslide off the edge of reality. Let me introduce you to, Half-Life
classic game 10/10

Не понимаю за что люди хвалят так эту игру. Если только за графику которая была на то время, то тогда игра переоценена. 
Я пытался понять хоть что то в этой игре, но тут настолько скучный геймплей, что я наверное на половине остановился и дальше проходить я не собираюсь. ИИ слишком тупой. Главный герой так вообще разговаривает всю игру. Возможно я что то не понимаю во вкусе, но это мое мнение и игра мне не понравилась не по каким характеристикам.

Media vida se fue de mi lado.
¡Cuántos años que no volverán!
Tan ligero bajé la pendiente
que me ha parecido que fue un tobogán.

Ya no canto subiendo escalones,
ya mis piernas las siento aflojar,
les disparo a las noches de invierno,
hoy es el espejo quien me hace pensar.


Media vida, ya te has ido,
que recuerdo me dejás
la otra media, si la vivo,
sabe Dios cómo será.

Media vida, me has dejado
¡tantas huellas en mi ser!
Y tanto es lo que he cambiado
que ya no soy la de ayer.

Muchas veces he visto en la cara
de los hombres que me dieron fe
esta misma tristeza piadosa,
que tienen mis ojos por ellos también.

Media vida se fue como un sueño.
¡Cuántos años que no volverán!
Media vida me queda tan solo
y ya mi cabeza empieza a nevar.

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand the Half-life series. The story is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most key plot points will go over a typical player’s head. There’s also Dr.Breen’s philosophical outlook, which is deftly woven into his characterisation his personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of the story, to realise that they’re not just emotional- they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Half-Life truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn’t appreciate, for instance, the charm in Alyx who is a very import character as she interacts with you and look for a way to save her father. I’m smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Gabe Newell’s genius wit unfolds itself on their television screens. What fools.. how I pity them.

And yes, by the way, i DO have a Lambda tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. It’s for the ladies’ eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they’re within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kiddo.

Half-Life 2 is one of the most popular sequels due to its continuation of the sci-fi horror storyline and implementation of a dystopian aspect as well. Half-Life 2 is known and will always be known for its great writing. While the graphics are a bit dated in todays standards, it does not really matter due to it being a FPS horror game. I would recommend trying this game out to immerse yourself in a old classic of horror and challenging environment.

There is no way to summarise Half-Life 2 in an efficient manner. That's like trying to summarise the Moon Landings, or the Great Pyramids of Giza; there is just no way.

Half-Life 2, in my opinion, is the best game of all time. (so far)

Half-Life 2 executes all the problems it faces from a range to above average, to perfect. And above average is a stretch if you ask me. This game is larger than life, and for some reason, kept me enticed.

World Building and Overall Atmosphere.

Half-Life 2 has such a rich atmosphere. The old soviet architecture helps to give it this realistic vibe and kenopsia of what once was. It's the reason why Garry's Mod is so scary, and liminally active. It also helps, since the textures are made from real-life scans of images. It's nothing short of just perfect. An 11/10 atmosphere.

Story.

Half-Life 2 offers an amazing story. Hell, it's just so good. The way the Source Engine's Choreographer helps visually tell the story is great too. And the: "Show no tell" narrative is perfect. Valve even got the assistance of a psychologist to determine if the facial animations were actually human, and not just some robot trying to imitate reality. So, yeah, that's why Half-Life 2 is so much better than other facial animations in games. They just seem to miss the mark completely. 
The gestures and animations are hand done, and are very realistic. Dr. Breen's conniving gestures are too well done actually. The Characters are, well, actual people. Not just bland, but funny as hell scientists. But, actual personality and judgement.

Graphics.

The Graphics are great, much like the textures. The lighting (and the HDR later on) are amazing. I like how the shadows look. (Although CS:GO and other updated Source Engine games have better shadows) The best examples of this are in Water Hazard, Ravenholm, and The Coast Section. Actually, the entire game; is a great example of lighting in general. I believe that HL2 still holds up.

Game-play.

This one is a woozy. I think that HL2's Game-play, for me at least, is perfect. The Physics Engine is so cool. Seeing a Cinder Block fly through a window and into a guys face is funny. The Gun-Play is great. However, other people have a variety of criticisms towards HL2's Gun-Play. 1. It's so easy, the AI is dumb. 2. The Guns sound bad. etc.

None of that matters though, because it's not for everyone. HL2 has very casual game play. I cannot say why this is, but i'm thankful that i don't have to earn the power trip like you do in the first game. It's kind of like a reward. Or a canonised version is that G-Man makes you immortal or something :D I love the game-play of HL2.

Audio.

As a man of composing myself, i love the sound design of HL2. It's very eargasmic. It feels very nice to listen to.
The Music is 10/10. Ambience with Electronic Drones and Industrial Guitars, and Drums. It's just too good.

Conclusion.

Whilst i think HL2 is the perfect game. HL2 can get boring when re-playing it, and there are some minor bugs. (Lighting Bug, and some wonky physics.) Some Chapters stretch out TOO much. (Water Hazard has great atmosphere and lighting, but damn, can get boring) I would give HL2 a 11/10 solely on my own opinion. May this game live on forever, as an amazing piece of art, and game design. Everyone should play this game.
